Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Kup : :

Kup liked how this Gromlock spoke. Educated, advanced. It was much more easy to understand him now.

Kup: I'd like to hear them all...

Kup's attention was stolen from Grimlock when Kup realized just where they were in the Ark.

Kup looks up at the center command seat. There, in stasis, was Optimus Prime.


foxmanroar1@... wrote:
In a message dated 6/18/2003 12:56:58 PM Eastern Daylight Time, roborick007@... writes:

: : Kup : :
Kup follows the others into the Ark. He stays next to Grimlock.

Kup: So old friend, I'm sure we have a lot to catch up on.



Grimlock Looked over at him, much, you would never beleive the paradise we left to ensure your future... My friend this time i have many stories i would like to tell you.
